name: Of One Mind
desc: Alloyed Collective - DLC Content Collective is part of the Alloyed Collective DLC. It is only available if the DLC is enabled when starting a run. Click for more info. Collective Alloyed Collective - DLC Content This content is part of the Alloyed Collective DLC. It is only available if the DLC is enabled when starting a run. Click for more info. Collective (Affix Buff) Gain the power of a Collective Elite. Gain a 30m dome that blocks all outside attacks and reduces skill cooldowns for all allies inside by 25% . On death, explode for 100% damage. Any enemies hit by the explosion will have their items disabled for 2.5s .
notes:
Of One Mind is an Elite equipment in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Alloyed Collective expansion. It can only be found as a rare drop from a   Collective Elite.
A player equipped with Of One Mind gains the power of a Collective Elite; 

A 30m dome that blocks projectiles and reduces ally & self Skill Cooldown by 20%
On Death, Explodes for 100% damage, disabling items for enemies for 2.5s
